languages.text: "Зря. Ты не умеешь останавливаться вовремя, людишко. Теперь моим Ревущим придется сделать то, что не сделала арена. А я посмотрю, как ты подыхаешь".
"You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."
languages.original_text: "Зря. Ты не умеешь останавливаться вовремя, людишко. Теперь моим Ревущим придется сделать то, что не сделала арена. А я посмотрю, как ты подыхаешь".

traits.locale_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “你可真不该这么做。你不明白什么叫适可而止，小人儿。现在我的尖啸者会割开你的喉咙，而我会亲眼看着你咽下最后一口气。”
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."

traits.locale_text: “你可真不该这么做。你不明白什么叫适可而止，小人儿。现在我的尖啸者会割开你的喉咙，而我会亲眼看着你咽下最后一口气。”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «No deberías haber hecho eso. No sabes cuándo parar, human{mf|o|a}. Ahora mis Aulladores tendrán que terminar lo que la arena empezó. Y seré testigo de tu último aliento».
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."

traits.locale_text: «No deberías haber hecho eso. No sabes cuándo parar, human{mf|o|a}. Ahora mis Aulladores tendrán que terminar lo que la arena empezó. Y seré testigo de tu último aliento».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「やめておけばいいものを。貴様は引き際というものを知らなすぎる、人間よ。これで我がシュリーカーたちはアリーナでの決着をつけて、私は貴様の死にざまを見届けよう」
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."

traits.locale_text: 「やめておけばいいものを。貴様は引き際というものを知らなすぎる、人間よ。これで我がシュリーカーたちはアリーナでの決着をつけて、私は貴様の死にざまを見届けよう」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Das hättet Ihr nicht tun sollen. Ihr wisst nicht, wann genug ist, Menschling. Nun müssen meine Kreischer zu Ende bringen, was die Arena angefangen hat. Und ich werde zusehen, wie Ihr Euren letzten Atemzug tut."
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."

traits.locale_text: "Das hättet Ihr nicht tun sollen. Ihr wisst nicht, wann genug ist, Menschling. Nun müssen meine Kreischer zu Ende bringen, was die Arena angefangen hat. Und ich werde zusehen, wie Ihr Euren letzten Atemzug tut."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Vous n'auriez pas dû faire ça. Vous ne savez pas quand vous arrêter, {mf|humain|humaine}. Mes Hurleurs vont devoir achever le travail commencé par l'arène, et je vais vous regarder rendre votre dernier souffle. »
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'auriez pas dû faire ça. Vous ne savez pas quand vous arrêter, {mf|humain|humaine}. Mes Hurleurs vont devoir achever le travail commencé par l'arène, et je vais vous regarder rendre votre dernier souffle. »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Hata ettin. Duracağın yeri bilmiyorsun insancık. Artık arenanın başlattığını Çığırtkanlarım bitirecek, ne yaparsın. Ben de son nefesini verişini izleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "You shouldn't have done that. You don't know when to stop, humanling. Now my Shriekers will have to finish what the arena started. And I'll watch you draw your last breath."

traits.locale_text: "Hata ettin. Duracağın yeri bilmiyorsun insancık. Artık arenanın başlattığını Çığırtkanlarım bitirecek, ne yaparsın. Ben de son nefesini verişini izleyeceğim."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger
